sqlMap.statement:
SELECT SBPL.DS_BIZ_LAST_PROC_TS AS DS_BIZ_LAST_PROC_TS
FROM DS_BIZ_PROC_LOG SBPL WHERE SBPL.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND SBPL.PROC_PGM_ID = #procPgmId# AND SBPL.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'

SELECT STE.GLBL_CMPY_CD AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,STE.SVC_TSS_ESCL_PK AS SVC_TSS_ESCL_PK ,STE.SVC_TSS_ESCL_DT AS SVC_TSS_ESCL_DT ,STE.SVC_TASK_NUM AS SVC_TASK_NUM ,STE.ESCL_TP_TXT AS ESCL_TP_TXT ,STE.DS_ACCT_NM AS DS_ACCT_NM ,STE.FIRST_LINE_ADDR AS FIRST_LINE_ADDR ,STE.MDL_NM AS MDL_NM ,STE.SER_NUM AS SER_NUM ,STE.TECH_NM AS TECH_NM ,STE.CELL_PHO_NUM AS CELL_PHO_NUM ,STE.SVC_PBLM_TP_CD AS SVC_PBLM_TP_CD ,STE.SVC_PBLM_LOC_TP_CD AS SVC_PBLM_LOC_TP_CD ,STE.SVC_PBLM_CRCT_TP_CD AS SVC_PBLM_CRCT_TP_CD ,STE.SVC_PBLM_RSN_TP_CD AS SVC_PBLM_RSN_TP_CD ,STE.MDSE_CD AS STE_MDSE_CD ,STE.HELP_DESK_TKT_NUM AS HELP_DESK_TKT_NUM ,STE.SVC_CMNT_TXT AS SVC_CMNT_TXT ,STE.ATT_DATA_DESC_TXT AS ATT_DATA_DESC_TXT ,STE.TECH_SPRT_GRP_EML_ADDR AS TECH_SPRT_GRP_EML_ADDR ,STED.GLBL_CMPY_CD AS STED_GLBL_CMPY_CD ,STED.SVC_TSS_ESCL_DTL_PK AS SVC_TSS_ESCL_DTL_PK ,STED.SVC_TSS_ESCL_PK AS STED_SVC_TSS_ESCL_PK ,STED.MDSE_CD AS MDSE_CD FROM SVC_TSS_ESCL STE ,SVC_TSS_ESCL_DTL STED WHERE STE.EZINTIME >#ezinTime# AND STE.SVC_TSS_ESCL_PROC_FLG = #procFlg# AND STE.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND STED.SVC_TSS_ESCL_PK = STE.SVC_TSS_ESCL_PK AND STED.GLBL_CMPY_CD = STE.GLBL_CMPY_CD AND STE.EZCANCELFLAG = '0' AND STED.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
SELECT AD.GLBL_CMPY_CD AS GLBL_CMPY_CD ,AD.ATT_DATA_PK AS ATT_DATA_PK FROM ATT_DATA AD WHERE AD.ATT_DATA_GRP_TXT = #attDataGrpTxt# AND AD.GLBL_CMPY_CD = #glblCmpyCd# AND AD.EZCANCELFLAG = '0'
